title: TV50 Celebrity Interviews
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television advertising
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television and youth
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television broadcasting - Awards
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television broadcasting - Social aspects
abstract: Interviews with thirteen celebrities from Australian television. Asked the same questions, their responses are recorded vox pop style.
description: Interviews with thirteen celebrities from Australian television. Asked the same questions, their responses are recorded vox pop style. Questions asked concern the celebrities' experiences of television both as a viewer and as a personality and performer as well as their thoughts on reality television and the state of Australian television in general. Interviews were conducted at ACMI for the TV50 exhibition in 2006.
